subject: Business
title: When to Pivot vs. Persist
description: A quick win: understand When to Pivot vs. Persist.

hook.text: Slack started as a video game company. The game failed, but the internal chat tool took off.

buildup.text: A pivot means changing strategy while keeping one foot planted in what you've already learned.

discovery.text: Instagram pivoted from a check-in app called Burbn. They kept the photo feature nobody expected.

twist.text: Not every struggle means pivot. Sometimes you're one iteration away from a breakthrough.

climax.text: The test: are you getting closer to product-market fit each cycle, or just running in circles?

punchline.text: A pivot isn't giving up. It's choosing which door to open.

quiz.question: What signal suggests it's time to pivot?
options: Repeated cycles show no progress toward product-market fit
